p.p: A vocabulary to describe the type of CDA document.
There are three possible representations for this:

ul.li: A single code from SNOMED CT
When using a single SNOMED CT code then the OID "2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.15" shall be used
A compositional expression consisting of multiple codes from SNOMED CT
When using multiple SNOMED CT the OID "2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.15.1" shall be used
A single code from a suitable alternative vocabulary
When using an alternative vocabulary code, then the OID shall contain the OID of the alternative vocabulary
When no ID is available for the alternative vocabulary, then the OID "2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.17.337" shall be used
